name: Yakeshi Shengli Coal Mine
company_mentions: Inner Mongolia Datang International Xilinhaote Mining Co.

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: Calculated from Xilinhaote City (https://miningdataonline.com/property/1810/Shengli-Mine.aspx). The Shengli Coalfield is located approximately 3 km from the outskirts of Xilinhaote City

operators: Inner Mongolia Datang International Xilinhaote Mining Co.
web_search_companies.notes: The facility is managed by Inner Mongolia Datang International Xilinhaote Mining Co., a subsidiary of China Datang Corporation. China Shenhua Energy Company Ltd. has an indirect ownership interest.
